author: Joseph Young
title: Shocking New Research Suggests Drastic Coronavirus Treatment Rethink
description: Most doctors in the U.S. and all across the world have been treating coronavirus primarily as a lung disease, says Mike Coudrey. The post Shocking New Research Suggests Drastic Coronavirus Treatment Rethink appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Coronavirus may not be a lung disease but rather a red blood cell-targeting one.
  • If so, a new approach to treating coronavirus patients may be needed, some doctors say.
  • Active usage of hydroxychloroquine could help with red blood cells… [+3888 chars]
